text: Kitaoka Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Kumamoto. It is a Soja shrine. This means all the kami of Higo Province are present there so the governor can conveniently worship all of them. The shrine has a 1000 year old camphor tree on it. ==References== Category:Soja shrines Category:Fuken-sha Category:Shinto shrines in Kumamoto Prefecture
title: Kitaoka Shrine
